scripts.integration: docker-compose -f integration-docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f integration-docker-compose.yml up test_server
scripts.test: docker-compose -f test-docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f test-docker-compose.yml up test_server
scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d server
scripts.build: docker-compose -f build-docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f build-docker-compose.yml build && docker-compose -f build-docker-compose.yml up -d server
